data.eml:eml: Pieza, a new genus of microbombyliids from the New World (Diptera: Mythicomyiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Evenhuis, Neal L. (2002): Pieza, a new genus of microbombyliids from the New World (Diptera: Mythicomyiidae). Zootaxa 36: 1-28, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156131
